Bolt 12 Trusted Contacts Protocol Design
Bolt 12 makes it possible for lightning wallets to provide a UX that is very close to traditional payment applications. By attaching offers to metadata describing who those offers belong to, users can manage their “contacts list” and easily pay them without any interaction (no need to manually share a Bolt 11 invoice for every payment).
